# SensNodePressure

< Back

sensNodePressure(ndtag, paramTag) Â¶

<blockquote>get nodal fluid pressure sensitivity to a parameter.</blockquote>

Parameters:

* ndtag (int) - the tag of the node whose pressure sensitivity is inquired.

* paramTag (int) - the tag of a pre-defined parameter.

|Returns:

nodal fluid pressure sensitivity.

|Return Type:

float
